item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I never approve, or disapprove, of anything now. It is an absurd attitude to take towards life." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Nowadays people know the price of everything and the value of nothing." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Men marry because they are tired; women, because they are curious: both are disappointed." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I have found that no exertion of the legs can bring two minds much nearer to the other" -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "The millions are awake enough for physical labor; but only one in a million is awake enoughfor effective intellectual exertion, only one in a hundred million to a poetic or devine life. To be awake is to be alive." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are each our own devil, and we make this world our hell." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The world is a stage and the play is badly cast." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The reason we all like to think so well of others is that we are all afraid for ourselves. The basis of optimism is sheer terror." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I can not help feeling that it is a mistake to think that the passion one feels in creation is ever really shown in the work one creates. Art is always more abstract than we fancy. Form and color tell us of form and color-that is all. It often seems to me that art conceals the artist more completely than it ever reveals hi m" -- Oscar Wilde
